trans-unit.source: Specifies UDP retransmission settings.
trans-unit.target: 指定 UDP 重新傳輸設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The maximum unicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 單點傳送重新傳輸最大計數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum multicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送重新傳輸最大計數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings" /> class with specified maximum unicast retransmit count and maximum multicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的單點傳送重新傳輸最大計數和多點傳送重新傳輸最大計數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The maximum unicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 單點傳送重新傳輸最大計數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum multicast retransmit count.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送重新傳輸最大計數。

trans-unit.source: The lower bound delay.
trans-unit.target: 下限延遲。

trans-unit.source: The upper bound delay.
trans-unit.target: 上限延遲。

trans-unit.source: The maximum delay per retransmission.
trans-unit.target: 每次重新傳輸的延遲上限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings" /> class with specified maximum unicast retransmit count and maximum multicast retransmit count, delay lower bound, delay upper bound, and maximum delay per retransmission.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的單點傳送重新傳輸最大計數和多點傳送重新傳輸最大計數、延遲下限、延遲上限，以及每次重新傳輸的延遲上限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.UdpRetransmissionSettings" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delay of the lower bound for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定重新傳輸設定下限的延遲。

trans-unit.source: The delay of the lower bound for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 重新傳輸設定下限的延遲。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delay of the upper bound for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定重新傳輸設定上限的延遲。

trans-unit.source: The delay of the upper bound for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 重新傳輸設定上限的延遲。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum delay per retransmission for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定重新傳輸設定的每個重新傳輸最大延遲。

trans-unit.source: The maximum delay per retransmission for the retransmission setting.
trans-unit.target: 重新傳輸設定的每個重新傳輸最大延遲。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum multicast retransmission count.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定多點傳送重新傳輸最大計數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum multicast retransmission count.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送重新傳輸最大計數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum unicast retransmission count.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定單點傳送重新傳輸最大計數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum unicast retransmission count.
trans-unit.target: 單點傳送重新傳輸最大計數。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the lower bound delay.
trans-unit.target: 指出 UDP 重新傳輸設定值是否應序列化下限延遲。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the lower bound delay; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UDP 重新傳輸設定值應序列化下限延遲，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the upper bound delay.
trans-unit.target: 指出 UDP 重新傳輸設定值是否應序列化上限延遲。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the upper bound delay; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UDP 重新傳輸設定值應序列化上限延遲，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the maximum delay per retransmission.
trans-unit.target: 指出 UDP 重新傳輸設定值是否應序列化每次重新傳輸的延遲上限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the UDP retransmission settings should serialize the maximum delay per retransmission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UDP 重新傳輸設定值應序列化每次重新傳輸的延遲上限，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
